thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 12 of 411
thread.title: Aida Crusan

author: Aida Crusan
title: Aida Crusan
text: I logged in to HomeAdvisor and they provided me 3 choices of companies in my area for termite eradication. All 3 companies phoned us immediately and 2 came to inspect premises. The other just gave us price of tenting which was in line and competitive. One company said the termites were concentrated in 3 places in flat roof area and none were in the attic. They inspected attic twice and found no termites. They recommended treating the flat roof area and spraying the attic with a chemical that kills the buggers on contact. We are very satisfied with their service and guarantee, and have contracted them to fumigate on a bi-monthly basis.
